high_descs: Go straight ahead, and then turn right and right again to face the end of the bed.
Shut the lid of the laptop and pick it up from the bed.
Hold the laptop and turn to the left, to face the tall dresser.
Holding the laptop, turn on the lamp on top of the dress.er
anns.task_desc: Hold a laptop and turn on the lamp.

high_descs: Move across the room to the foot of the bed next to the laptop
Pick up the laptop sitting on top of the bed
Carry the laptop to the small wood table in the corner of the room
Turn on the lamp on top of the table
anns.task_desc: Carry a laptop while turning on a lamp

high_descs: move forward, turn to the left in front of the bean bag chair, move towards the end of the bed and turn to face the bed
close the lid of the laptop that is at the bottom of the bed and pick up the lap top
turn to the left to face the dresser in front of the lamp on the left side of the dresser
anns.task_desc: examine a laptop by the light of the lamp on the dresser
